thread.title: Michael Hanrahan
thread.title_full: Affordable Golf reviewed by Michael Hanrahan

author: Michael Hanrahan
title: Michael Hanrahan
text: Ordered custom clubs and encountered problems due to the Manufacturer as they were updating the range. Elaine kept me informed and despite not being able to fulfill my original order they supplied me with the newer club to the same specifications at no extra cost. Once the problem was sorted the clubs arrived quickly (to Ireland) and well packaged. Will be returning.
